name: The Good Samaritan Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What does Jerry have in his car?
questions.explanation:
A car phone.

	Elaine wonders why Jerry has the car phone in his car because it's dangerous, but Jerry says he uses the speaker in case anyone needs him.

questions.text: When confronting the woman who hit the parked car, what does he say?
options: She shouldn't have hit the car
questions.explanation:
Her left tire is low.

	Elaine tells Jerry to follow the woman to yell at her and she parks the car, so Jerry tries to tell her that she did a bad thing.  It turns out that the woman is beautiful and he can't make himself tell her that she hit the car.  They end up getting coffee together.

questions.text: Who ends up eating dinner with Elaine and the married couple?
questions.explanation:
George.

	After Jerry gets a date with the hit-and-run driver, George takes the meal after Elaine offers to pay for him.

questions.text: During the dinner Elaine says she dated a man with what profession?
questions.explanation:
Bullfighter.

	Elaine states that she went out with a bullfighter, but it's easy to tell she's lying because she makes up an obviously phony name.

questions.text: Who is Jerry's hit-and-run girlfriend during this episode?
questions.explanation:
Angela.

	Jerry ends up trying keeping the secret from Elaine during the whole episode.  During their dates, he tries to make it clear to Angela that she should leave a note or sit and wait for the other driver after an accident.

questions.text: What TV show are Elaine and Jerry watching when Kramer gets a seizure?
questions.explanation:
Entertainment Tonight.

	Elaine realizes that Mary Hart's voice is probably giving Kramer his seizures.

questions.text: What is the name of the woman who has an affair with George?
questions.explanation:
Robin.

	Robin cheats on her husband after George says "God bless you" during the dinner at the restaurant.  George doesn't like the idea of sleeping with her.

questions.text: Does Elaine find out about Jerry dating the hit-and-run driver?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Elaine walks in on Angela telling Jerry to never tell anyone about her hitting the car.

questions.text: What is the name of the woman who had their car damaged?
questions.explanation:
Becky & Becky Gelke.

	Becky believes that Jerry actually damaged the car after he tries to pay for the damages. But, he really does like her.

questions.text: There is a man named Michael in this episode.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Michael is Robin's husband.  He knows that George and Robin are sleeping together, so George makes Jerry leave the city on a vacation with him.
